text: David Malone may refer to: *David Malone (independent filmmaker) (born 1962), British documentary filmmaker *David M. Malone (born 1954), Canadian scholar- diplomat *Dave Malone (born 1952), American guitarist/vocalist of The Radiators *David Malone (television producer), Irish-born creator of factual and entertainment television formats *David Malone (swimmer) (born 1977), Irish paralympian *David Malone (sport shooter) (born 1964), Irish sports shooter
